publishers
Class TickerPublisher

java.lang.Object
  publishers.TickerPublisher

public final class TickerPublisher
extends java.lang.Object

This class consists of methods that allow a User to subscribe or unsubscibe to get ticher information stock, and a method that sends out last ticker updates.

Author:
Urvi

Method Summary

Method Detail

getInstance

public static TickerPublisher getInstance()
                                   throws InvalidArgumentException
Returns the only instance of the TickerPublisher class that will be used throughout the system.

Returns:
A TickerPublisher instance
Throws:

See Also:
TickerPublisherImplFactory.getPublisher(publishers.IPublisher.PubType)

subscribe

public void subscribe(User user,
                      java.lang.String prod)
               throws AlreadySubscribedException,
                      InvalidArgumentException
Subscribes a user to receive ticker updates for a given stock.

Parameters:
user - User who wishes to subscribe.
prod - Product symbol for which User wants ticker updates.
Throws:
AlreadySubscribedException - if user is already subscribed to the product.
InvalidArgumentException - if user or prod is null

unSubscribe

public void unSubscribe(User user,
                        java.lang.String prod)
                 throws NotSubscribedException,
                        InvalidArgumentException
Unsubscribes a user from receiving ticker updates for a given stock.

Parameters:
user - User who wishes to unsubscribe.
prod - Product symbol for which User no longer wants ticker updates.
Throws:
NotSubscribedException - if user was not subscribed to the product.
InvalidArgumentException

publishTicker

public void publishTicker(java.lang.String product,
                          Price priceIn)
                   throws InvalidArgumentException
Sends out ticker information to all subscribed users. This method also saves the last prices for products and determines if the prices have gone up, down, or stayed the same.

Parameters:
product - Stock symbol for which User wants ticker updates.
priceIn - The current price of the stock. This is compared to the saved price to determine the direction of the stock price.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - if product or priceIn is null
